Obstetrics.Pregnancies ( $  nr,
$  nr_type = '_ENC' 
)

Gets pregnancy information based on either the pid number or encounter number.

The data returned have index keys as outlined at the $fld_prenancy array. public

Parameters:
int Primary record key number
string Flags the type of the first parameter. '_ENC' = encounter number, '_REG' = pid number.
Returns:
mixed adodb record object or boolean

Obstetrics.ChildNrAtParent ( $  child_nr = 0,
$  parent_nr = 0 
)

Checks if the encounter number of a child is recorded at the parent's encounter record.

return:

  • _CHILD_EXISTS = child encounter nr is recorded at parent
  • _NO_CHILD = child encounter nr is not recorded at parent
  • _NO_EXISTS = parent pregnancy record not exists public
    Parameters:
    int = Encounter number of the child
    int = Encounter number of the parent
    Returns:
    string

Obstetrics.AddChildNrToParent ( $  child_nr = 0,
$  parent_nr = 0,
&$  birth 
)

Adds the encounter number of a child to the parents encounter record.

The birth details are passed by reference with an associative array. The data must be prepared having the following index keys:

  • delivery_date = date of delivery (birth)
  • delivery_nr = the number or this birth e.g. 3rd, 4th, etc.
  • delivery_mode = the mode of delivery
  • outcome = the outcome of the delivery public
    Parameters:
    int = Encounter number of the child
    int = Encounter number of the parent
    Returns:
    boolean
